faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about admission
faq.search: Enter keyword to search (e.g.: exam, certificate, cost)...
faq.noQuestionsInCategory: No questions in this category yet
faq.contactTitle: Didn't find an answer to your question?

general.a1: Document submission at Salymbekov University begins on July 1 and continues until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted both in person at the admissions office and online through our website.
general.q2: What educational programs does the university offer?
general.a2: Salymbekov University offers programs in: General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the KR.
general.q3: How long does the education last?
general.a3: The duration of education depends on the program: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.q4: In what languages is education conducted?
general.a4: Education is conducted in Russian and Kyrgyz languages. Students can choose their preferred language of instruction upon admission.
general.q5: Is there practice in foreign clinics?
general.a5: Yes, the university cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. The best students can do internships abroad.
general.q6: Is the diploma recognized outside Kyrgyzstan?
general.a6: Salymbekov University diploma is recognized in CIS countries. For work in other countries, additional certification may be required according to local legislation.

general.admissionStart: Document submission at Salymbekov University starts on July 1 and continues until August 15 each year. Documents can be submitted in person at the admission office or online through our website.
general.programs: Salymbekov University offers programs in: General Medicine, Dentistry, Pharmacy, Nursing. All programs are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic.
general.duration: Study duration depends on the program: General Medicine - 6 years, Dentistry and Pharmacy - 5 years, Nursing - 4 years.
general.languages: Teaching is conducted in Russian and Kyrgyz languages. Students can choose their preferred language of instruction upon admission.
general.internship: Yes, the university cooperates with leading medical centers in Germany, Turkey and other countries. The best students can do internships abroad.
general.diplomaRecognition: Salymbekov University diploma is recognized in CIS countries. For work in other countries, additional certification according to local legislation may be required.
general.exchangePrograms: Yes, the university participates in academic mobility programs with partner universities in Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkey and other countries.
general.militaryDeferment: Yes, full-time students receive deferment from military service for the entire study period according to the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic.

documents.required: Required documents: high school diploma, passport, medical certificate form 086U, ORT certificate, photos 3x4 (6 pcs), family composition certificate, income certificate (for benefits).
documents.nostrification: Yes, education documents obtained outside the Kyrgyz Republic are subject to mandatory nostrification in relevant state authorities.
documents.medicalValidity: Medical certificate form 086U is valid for 6 months from the date of issue. The certificate must contain all necessary medical examinations.
documents.onlineSubmission: Yes, you can apply online through our website. After application approval, you will need to provide original documents within 3 days.
documents.translation: Documents in Russian language do not require translation. Documents in other languages must be translated into Kyrgyz or Russian and notarized.
documents.lostDocuments: If documents are lost, they must be restored in the relevant authorities. For diploma contact your school, for passport - Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Kyrgyz Republic. The procedure may take up to 30 days.

exams.subjects: For medical specialties (General Medicine, Dentistry): biology and chemistry. For Pharmacy: chemistry and biology. For Nursing: only biology. ORT certificate is also required.
exams.dates: Entrance exams are held from August 20 to 25. The exact schedule is published on the university website and in the admission office by August 15.
exams.minimumScore: Minimum ORT scores: General Medicine - 120, Dentistry - 110, Pharmacy - 100, Nursing - 90 points. For profile subjects - minimum 60% correct answers.
exams.retake: Retaking entrance exams is possible only in the next academic year. Only one attempt is given in the current year.
exams.preparation: The university conducts preparatory courses from May to July. Also recommend using textbooks for grades 10-11 in biology and chemistry, ORT tests from previous years.
exams.format: Exams are conducted in test form. Each test contains 40 questions, time limit - 90 minutes. Forms for computer processing of results are used.
exams.benefits: Benefits are provided to orphans, disabled people of groups I-II, combat veterans. Winners of republican olympiads are enrolled without exams.

payment.cost: Tuition fees: General Medicine - 180,000 KGS/year, Dentistry - 200,000 KGS/year, Pharmacy - 160,000 KGS/year, Nursing - 140,000 KGS/year. Prices may change annually.
payment.discounts: Yes, discounts are provided: 15% for excellent students (GPA 4.5+), 10% for full year payment, 5% for large families, benefits for socially vulnerable categories.
payment.installment: Yes, payment by semesters is possible (50% by September 1, 50% by February 1) or monthly (10 equal payments from September to June). Additional fee for installment - 5%.
payment.methods: Payment is possible by: bank transfer, online banking (Elsom, Balance.kg, MBank), cash at university cash desk, through payment terminals, bank card.
payment.included: The fee includes: lectures, practical classes, access to library, laboratory work, internet on campus. Additional payment for: textbooks, dormitory, meals.

hostel.availability: Yes, the university provides a modern dormitory for 200 places. Placement is by application in order of priority. Priority is given to non-resident students and orphans.
hostel.cost: The cost of accommodation is 3000 KGS per month per place in a room for 2-3 people. The price includes: utilities, internet, cleaning of common areas.
hostel.conditions: The dormitory is equipped with: furniture, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchens on each floor, study rooms, Wi-Fi, video surveillance system, 24/7 security.
hostel.application: The application is submitted simultaneously with admission documents. You need to fill out a questionnaire, provide family income certificates, medical certificate, registration documents.

reviews.title: Student Reviews
reviews.subtitle: What our students say about studying at the university

student1.name: Anna Ivanova
student1.text: Studying at the medical faculty gave me invaluable knowledge and practical skills. The professors are experienced practicing doctors who share real-life expertise.

student2.name: Maksim Petrov
student2.text: An excellent combination of theory and practice! Already in the 3rd year, we started clinical training, which allows us to apply knowledge in real conditions.

student3.name: Elena Smirnova
student3.text: Modern equipment and an advanced approach to education. I especially value the simulation center where we can practice skills before clinical work.

student4.name: Dmitry Kozlov
student4.text: An engaging program with deep immersion in biochemistry and pharmacology. Professors support students’ scientific initiatives.

student5.name: Olga Novikova
student5.text: I enrolled this year and I’m already impressed! The atmosphere encourages learning, with plenty of practical classes and modern laboratories.

mission.title: University Mission and Vision
mission.subtitle: Our purpose and values
mission.missionText: Salymbekov University strives to become a leading medical educational institution in Central Asia, providing high-quality education, innovative research, and healthcare for the population.

education.title: Education
education.description: Providing quality medical education that meets international standards

science.title: Science
science.description: Advancing medical research and implementing innovative technologies in healthcare

medicine.title: Medicine
medicine.description: Training highly qualified medical professionals to serve society

studentCare.title: Student Care
studentCare.description: Creating a supportive educational environment and promoting holistic student development

priorities: Modernizing educational programs in accordance with international standards
Developing research activities and innovative projects
Strengthening international cooperation and academic mobility
Improving the university's material and technical base
Enhancing the quality of medical personnel training
Developing digital technologies in education and medicine

charter.title: Salymbekov University Charter
charter.description: The main founding document defining the legal status, goals, objectives and operating procedures of the university

qualityAssurance.title: Educational Quality Assurance System Regulations

libraryRegulations.title: Library Regulations
